'''"otherside"''' refers to both a song composed by [[Lena Raine]], and a [[music disc]] that plays the song when inserted in a [[jukebox]]. The music disc is obtained from various structures, but is most commonly found in [[ancient city|ancient cities]].

{{Music disclaimer}}
[[File:Otherside.ogg]]

"otherside" starts off as an uplifting and happy retro-style ostinato in a major key. Upon reaching the second half, the song changes to a minor key and progresses into a darker melody, eventually cutting off abruptly. A clock can be heard ticking quickly at the end.

== Usage ==
Like all music discs, {{control|using}} the "otherside" music disc on a [[jukebox]] causes the jukebox to play the song.

If the [[player]] places a [[redstone comparator]] besides a jukebox playing "otherside", it will emit a [[Redstone mechanics|redstone signal]] of 14.
